title: A person eligible for redevelopment scheme shall mean a protected occupier as defined in Chapter-IB of Maharashtra Slums Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971 as amended time to time, (hereinafter referred to as the Slum Act) and orders issued there under
clause_text: A person eligible for redevelopment scheme shall mean a protected occupier as defined in Chapter-IB of Maharashtra Slums Areas (Improvement, Clearance and Redevelopment) Act, 1971 as amended time to time, (hereinafter referred to as the Slum Act) and orders issued there under.
